name: Big Big Fish
description:
Being a shark in the ocean, you know the rule to live, eat the fish smaller than you!

You got 90 seconds to grow and become the strongest Ocean Overlord to conquer the sea!

Ready? Swim!

Features:
*Free to play
*Move fast and eat as much fish as you can
*Be careful with your enemies, run away from the bigger shark but catch and eat the smaller fish
